helpModal.title: How to Use Packsi
helpModal.paragraph1: Register your trip by entering your departure, destination, and travel date. This lets others know when and where you are traveling.
helpModal.paragraph2: Senders who want to deliver a package on your route will contact you through the platform. You can review their request and agree if it suits you.
helpModal.paragraph3: Carry the package with you on your trip and deliver it at the destination. It's that simple — and you earn money while traveling!

helpUnlimitedModal.title: استفاده نامحدود
helpUnlimitedModal.paragraph1: Get unlimited access to Packsi by verifying your mobile number and completing your profile. This builds trust with senders and keeps the community safe and reliable.
helpUnlimitedModal.paragraph2: Verification is fast — just enter the code we send to your phone. Complete your profile with a photo, short bio, and basic ID details so senders feel confident choosing you.
helpUnlimitedModal.paragraph3: Once verified and profile-complete, you can post unlimited delivery requests for free. Start turning your trips into earnings — easy, secure, and ready right away!
